name: Super Adventure (itch)
description: Welcome to Super Adventure! This game's art style is inspired by nostalgic Flash games of the late 2000s and early 2010's.  Travel across strange lands and help Beep get back to his rightful place. Play through ten awesome levels and meet friends along the way.  Go through a mysterious forest, a relaxing beach and a hot desert and many more! Enjoy! Controls: Space = Jump.  Left and right arrows = move left and right. Wall jump= get near a wall and keep on holding the direction you are facing and jump with space multiple times. Z= Throw baseballs.    X = Shoot arrow.    C = Throw hammer.    V = Throw bombs.    B = Throw boomerangs.     N = Smile Shield.   Tip: It can block and protect you from enemies and gives you more time to kill them!    Note:  This game is pretty old and low quality.   It was made with this game engine called Flowlab.    https://flowlab.io/      It works in browser.    I am making a remake which will add new content and overall, make it the definitive way to play the game.   Also, i'm making a sequel.  It will be in a other engine than flowlab.   I can't give too much details for now  but I want it to be a huge improvent over the first game.  I hope you guys like this game, no matter it's quality.  Low quality games can still suceed.  You need to ask me if you can feature it on any website.  I would be pretty surpised if this game got called game of the year or something. You can also tell me your opinions on the game down below so I can improve.  Hopefully this game does well:)
